  • Method Details

    • all

      public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<? extends ExtraWeatherFee>> all()
      Retrieves all available extra weather conditions and their associated fees.
      Returns:
      A CollectionModel containing EntityModel instances of all available extra weather conditions and their fees with links to the corresponding operations.

    • getAirConditions

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<AirTemperatureConditions> getAirConditions()
      Retrieves the entity model representing the air temperature conditions.
      Returns:
      An EntityModel containing the air temperature conditions with links to the corresponding operations.
      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the air temperature conditions are not found.

    • getWindConditions

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<WindSpeedConditions> getWindConditions()
      Retrieves the entity model representing the wind speed conditions.
      Returns:
      An EntityModel containing the wind speed conditions with links to the corresponding operations.
      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the wind speed conditions are not found.

    • getPhenomenonConditions

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<WeatherPhenomenonConditions> getPhenomenonConditions()
      Retrieves the entity model representing the weather phenomenon conditions.
      Returns:
      An EntityModel containing the weather phenomenon conditions with links to the corresponding operations.
      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the weather phenomenon conditions are not found.

    • updateAirTemperatureConditions

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<AirTemperatureConditions> updateAirTemperatureConditions(Map<String,Object> fields)
      Updates the air temperature conditions with the provided fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - A Map containing the fields to update and their new values.
      Returns:
      EntityModel indicating the success of the update operation and containing the updated air temperature conditions with links to the corresponding operations.
      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the air temperature conditions are not found.
      BadRequestBodyException - If the updated float value of a field in NON_NEGATIVE_FIELDS is negative.
      BadRequestBodyException - If the value of a field is not a number or not compatible with float type.

    • updateWindConditions

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateWindConditions(Map<String,Object> fields)
      Updates the wind speed conditions with the provided fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - A Map containing the fields to update and their new values.
      Returns:
      EntityModel indicating the success of the update operation and containing the updated wind speed conditions with links to the corresponding operations.
      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the wind speed conditions are not found.
      BadRequestBodyException - If the updated float value of a field in NON_NEGATIVE_FIELDS is negative.
      BadRequestBodyException - If the value of a field is not a number or not compatible with float type.

      Updates the weather phenomenon conditions with the provided fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - A Map containing the fields to update and their new values.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if the weather phenomenon conditions are not found.

      BadRequestBodyException - If the value of a field is not a number or not compatible with float type.
